Class Sounds

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Sounds

public class Sounds
extends greenfoot.Actor

Sounds is a class to handle the suite of sounds used in The Knight's Call. Nicholas Paul

Version:
22

Constructor Detail

Sounds

public Sounds()
This is a general constructor for the Sounds class. Specifically it assigns all the sound files to memory locations.
